name: EventMobi Registration
author: EventMobi

sections.description:
EventMobi Registration Plugin provides a seamless way to integrate EventMobi registration into your WordPress site. Here’s how you can set it up and use it:

Installation:

  1. Ensure you have an active EventMobi account with registration functionality enabled.
  2. Download the eventmobi-registration.zip file.
  3. Extract the contents of the zip file.
  4. Upload the eventmobi-registration folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory on your WordPress site.
  5. Navigate to the Plugins screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  6. Locate the EventMobi Registration plugin and click Activate.

Usage:

  1. Once activated, you’ll see the EventMobi Registration tab in your admin menu.
  2. Click on this tab. Here, you can toggle between Manual and Connected modes.
    • Manual Mode: Input the event code for your registration.
    • Connected Mode: Select your registration site from a dropdown list. To use this mode, you’ll need an API key.

Important: Obtain your API key from EventMobi Experience under the “Integrations” tab of your organization. For further assistance, visit the EventMobi Help Center.
sections.installation:
To install the EventMobi Registration plugin, follow these steps:

  1. Download the eventmobi-registration.zip file.
  2. Extract the contents of the zip file.
  3. Upload the eventmobi-registration folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory on your WordPress site.
  4. Navigate to the Plugins screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  5. Find the EventMobi Registration plugin and click Activate.
